p: The authors, strongly suggest that national public health authorities actively advise worldwide governments and communities to implement measures for all users to disinfect mobile phones. The CDC has initiated this with a focus on COVID19 bit it needs to be presented more broadly to cover any pathogenic organisms. This should be coupled with the global public health campaign promoting the benefits of hand washing which could be drastically suboptimal if we consider the regular interaction of washed hands with micro silly contaminated mobile phones. Mobile phones are potential ‘Trojan horses’ for microbes that each user accommodates, carries and potentially transfers to the community and workplaces enabling contagion to occur.
